hello, where I can find gstreamer0.8-lam: what should I add in sources.list?
add multiverse to the end of the line that says multiverse already.
to upgrade from Hoary to Breezy replace all instances of Hoary with Breezy in /etc/apt/sources.list
then sudo apt-get update && sudo-apt-get dist-upgrade
Breezy is still a development version tho, so it might not work out of the box just yet.
but i want my hoary with gnome 2.12
then you'll have to compile it from source
2.12 will not be made available for Hoary
ubuntu and gnome have a coupled release schedule. every 6 months, both release. Stable versions only get bugfixes.
trust me, you don't want to compile 2.12 on Hoary, so much has changed in the underlying structure, it's far better to upgrade.
